Articles.Content: I can use Smart ASS to point in the retrograde direction relative to orbital velocity, but how about surface velocity? Can I somehow tell MechJeb to keep pointing retrograde relative to the surface? If not, is there some other addon that does that?
Yes you can. Go to the advanced tab in Smart ASS and you can find it.
Go to the advanced tab, select Relative to Surface, select backwards, hit engage.

I've been using Mechjeb since 0.17.

This is the first time I've heard of the advanced tab.
